block.sc-goodies.iron_chest.desc: Capable of storing up to 54 stacks of items.
block.sc-goodies.gold_chest.desc: Capable of storing up to 81 stacks of items.
block.sc-goodies.diamond_chest.desc: Capable of storing up to 108 stacks of items.
block.sc-goodies.ender_storage.desc:
Advanced Ender Chest that links chests based on color patterns.
Use dye on the lid to change the frequency.
Use a diamond on the latch to use a personal frequency.
block.sc-goodies.ender_storage.desc.comp: Use an emerald on the latch to allow ComputerCraft to change the frequency.
block.sc-goodies.ender_storage.not_owner: You are not the owner of this Ender Storage.
block.sc-goodies.ender_storage.computer_: Computers are now %s to change the frequency of this Ender Storage.
Computers are now %s from changing the frequency of this Ender Storage.
